articles.description: After Philippines exited from the 2022 FIBA Asia Cup with a loss to Japan on Tuesday, what does the immediate future hold for Gilas Pilipinas?
articles.content:
Gilas Pilipinas' campaign in the 2022 FIBA Asia Cup in Jakarta has mercifully come to an end after they absorbed a 102-81 beating at the hands of Japan on Tuesday night.
